paper_abstract: We give some characterizations of Schnorr triviality. In concrete terms, we introduce a reducibility related to decidable prefix-free machines and show the equivalence with Schnorr reducibility. We also give a uniform-Schnorr-randomness version of the equivalence of LR-reducibility and LK-reducibility. Finally we prove a base-type characterization of Schnorr triviality.
paper_title: Schnorr Triviality and Its Equivalent Notions
